summary: N Is a Number: A Portrait of Paul Erdos is a 1993 biographical documentary about the life of mathematician Paul Erdos, directed by George Paul Csicsery.
cast: Paul Erdös|Ronald Graham|Joel Spencer|J.W.S. Cassels|Marta Sved|Tibor Gallai|Béla Bollobas|Fan Chung|Melvyn Nathanson|Laszlo Lovasz|Herbert Wilf|Tomasz Luczak|Andrzej Rucinski|Peter Winkler|Michael Karonski|Alice Fialowski|Gabriella Bollobas|Anne Davenport|Lady Bertha Jeffreys|Deborah Knous|Gene Patterson|Elise Patterson|Gyula Katona
title: N Is a Number: A Portrait of Paul Erdös
